title: [Self-Directed] Deep Learning Integration Strategy Incorporating Domain Knowledge for Metasurface Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational electromagnetism, metamaterial concepts, and basic machine learning theory
context.additional_context: A blended course for corporate R&D managers, combining smartphone-based mobile learning with workshops

learning_goals: Combining domain knowledge (equivalent circuit theory) with deep learning models can streamline the metasurface design process by over 40%
Generative model design using Variational Autoencoders (VAE) can reduce optimal structure search time by 50%
Derive design parameters implementing broadband/dual-band/band-stop characteristics in Frequency Selective Surface (FSS) application cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
